OBJECTIVE.description: Locate Dum Dum Dugan to find out what's happening on the Omega Base.

OBJECTIVE.descname: A Long Way to the Top

OBJECTIVE.description: Take Dr. Banner and deactivate the Gamma Bomb before it explodes.

OBJECTIVE.description: Defeat MODOK in battle before the Omega Base slams into the dam.
